DOC.brief_title: Head Neck Cancer Children : A Retrospective Study
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Although head neck mass represent common entity child , malignancy uncommon . Only limited data available literature incidence childhood cancer head neck worldwide . Data United States National Cancer Institute database suggest head neck involve 12 % childhood malignancy . The common pediatric head neck malignancy include Non Hodgkin lymphoma , Hodgkin lymphoma , rhabdomyosarcoma , thyroid malignancy , nasopharyngeal carcinoma ( NPCs ) , salivary gland malignancy , neuroblastomas . Patients & Methods : A hospital-based study , involve Pediatric cancer patient , diagnose malignant tumor head & neck , period 2001 January till 2015 December , receive treatment pediatric oncology department , medical record retrospectively review data collection . Clinico-laboratory data hisopathologic disease entity various head & neck malignancy gather . The demographic distribution disease entity accordance gender & age , site preference disease entity record . Treatment receive & treatment outcomes verify absolute frequency & relative incidence disease entity calculate .
